versos: (nets) Matthew 4:20: "Immediately they left their nets and followed him.";;;
(lilies) "Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not; and yet I say unto you, that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these." - Luke 12:27 KJV;;;
(baths) Song of Solomon 8:12 - My own vineyard is at my disposal; the thousand shekels are for you, Solomon, and two hundred more for those who take care of its fruit.;;;
(bases) Ezekiel 41:19 - "He also measured the width of the entrance of the temple and found it to be forty cubits.";;;
(wheel) Ezekiel 1:15 - "Now as I looked at the living creatures, I saw a wheel on the earth beside the living creatures, one for each of the four of them.";;;
(clay) Isaiah 64:8 - But now, O Lord, You are our Father; we are the clay, and You our potter; and all we are the work of Your hand.;;;
(settled) Psalm 119:89 - "Your word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.";;;
(prayeth) James 5:16 - "Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.";;;

(maintain) 2 Thessalonians 3:6 - "In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, we command you, brothers and sisters, to keep away from every believer who is idle and disruptive and does not live according to the teaching you received from us.";;;
(joyful) Psalm 5:11 - But let all who take refuge in you be glad; let them ever sing for joy. Spread your protection over them, that those who love your name may rejoice in you.;;;
(husband) Ephesians 5:25 - "Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her.";;;
(arabia) Galatians 1:17 - "nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me; but I went to arabia, and returned again to Damascus.";;;
(pound) Luke 19:13 - "So he called ten of his servants and gave them ten minas. Put this money to work, he said, until I come back.";;;
(ivory) Ezekiel 27:15 - "The men of Dedan were your traders; many coastlands were your market; they brought you in payment ivory tusks and ebony.";;;
(sycomore) Luke 19:4 - "So he ran ahead and climbed a sycamore-fig tree to see him, since Jesus was coming that way.";;;
